channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Enterprise Extension Defense Forces & Public Security (EA-DFPS)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Enterprise Extension Defense Forces & Public Security (EA-DFPS)

item.title: CVE-2022-31592|2024-08-03T07:19:06.825Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20enterprise%20extension%20defense%20forces%20%26%20public%20security%20%28ea-dfps%29
item.description: The application SAP Enterprise Extension Defense Forces & Public Security - versions 605, 606, 616,617,618, 802, 803, 804, 805, 806, does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user over the network, resulting in escalation of privileges leading to a limited impact on confidentiality.
